mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, transfer_nation1, transfer_city1, transfer_nation2, transfer_city2, transfer_nation3, transfer_city3, transfer_nation4, transfer_city4, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users WHERE user_id=#{userId};
select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4;

select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, transfer_nation1, transfer_city1, transfer_nation2, transfer_city2, transfer_nation3, transfer_city3, transfer_nation4, transfer_city4, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users WHERE start_time <= #{endTime} AND end_time >= #{startTime} AND (start_city = #{startCity} OR transfer_city1 = #{startCity} OR transfer_city2 = #{startCity} OR transfer_city3 = #{startCity} OR transfer_city4 = #{startCity}) AND (dest_city = #{destCity} OR transfer_city1 = #{destCity} OR transfer_city2 = #{destCity} OR transfer_city3 = #{destCity} OR transfer_city4 = #{destCity})

select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, transfer_nation1, transfer_city1, transfer_nation2, transfer_city2, transfer_nation3, transfer_city3, transfer_nation4, transfer_city4, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users WHERE start_time <= #{endTime} AND end_time >= #{startTime} AND user_id != #{userId} AND (start_city = #{startCity} OR transfer_city1 = #{startCity} OR transfer_city2 = #{startCity} OR transfer_city3 = #{startCity} OR transfer_city4 = #{startCity}) AND (dest_city = #{destCity} OR transfer_city1 = #{destCity} OR transfer_city2 = #{destCity} OR transfer_city3 = #{destCity} OR transfer_city4 = #{destCity})
select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users WHERE username LIKE #{peopleName}
